subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong will miss this week’s Tour of the Gila in New Mexico. Organizers blamed what they say is a rarely enforced International Cycling Federation rule. Jack Brennan, the race director, said the federation planned to enforce a rule that prohibits top-level pro teams from competing in national-level events like the Tour of the Gila. It would have been Armstrong’s first race since he broke his collarbone last month.
